body: The author must receive a commission request to continue this story....

@Apocoloco yes, this is the end, next story Is another NTR but with a yuri couple (which is even more shittier IMO). Dude didn't have a revenge chapter like the husband did in the first story, and he didn't even appear untial that chapter LMAO
Lol, the bitch is just mad the MC ran away to avoid paying child support for her kid from another man.

From what others are saying, if at the end FMC is going to kill MC for the clan, then this story is shitty and really out of character; so in other words, she didn't actually love MC that much then tbh.
well, I like this shit

So, MC run away with the enemy after everything happened and the old dude told the girl that she must kill him for the sake of the clan and the baby and she agrees? I thought it would end with FMC and MC ending together and raising the child, like her father did, to symbolize the endless cycle the village goes through or something. Feels super weird the sudden change of the FMC feeling for MC.
this is the end or not? It must be the first time in an ntr that is a little different
i mean.... happy end, right?
I hope that the MC will become stronger, then kill her and the chief and gets revenge on the village
It would be nice if the MC she was dating gets strong and rapes her instead, but she did do it with the whole village so she might an op sex god or something.

@METROID 2.00 You're right, it's a business and bills need to be paid but, goddamn... another generic FF7 doujin? There has been some more works with Cloud doing something that isn't yaoi due to advent of the FF7 Remake, but surely Sena could do something more exciting, he's shown that he could before and could certainly do so again.
I don't feels NTR at lmao .. but nice art

@JustHereToLurk agree. I'm mostly a vanilla guy but I don't mind to read some cheating doujins from time to time, but I absolutely dislike those trash NTR stories.   
Ironically enough, author said on Twitter he wants to make a Final Fantasy 7 NTR doujin for the next Comitek using the skills he learned from this anthology, which imply Is just another "Tifa gets blackmailed/gangbangded/raped by Don Corneo and pals while Cloud do jack shit" doujin. How original, like we haven't had enough of it!

子作りが目的なのになんでケツとか口とかに射精すんのかわからん。完全に無駄打ちじゃん。
身重のくノ一に抜け忍の討伐を命じるのもわからん。万が一の事があって子が産めなくなったら本末転倒じゃん。
…流石に頭悪すぎでは？
@ablatsviosky The mc went to hide away with an enemy clan after all the shit that they put him through and now she wants to kill him. Again, felt very rushed and "undeserved."
Wait what happened?! Why did the girl want to kill the mc?

@Diddo Yeah this all seems to "comical" for me. Everything feels too unearned, the reasoning for the girl now wanting to kill the guy despite her love for him to the reason of the clan for making the main guy suffer. This is also apparently the end of this anthology story with no aftermath on as to what happens. Overall, this is all extremely ham-fisted and disappointing by Sena. A far cry from his previous masterpieces. I'm glad the NTR readers (including myself sometimes depending on the work) are experiencing a surplus, but man, the effort has been lowered ever since artists rode on this train affecting the likes of not only Sena but also Great Mosu and more. The same shit generic doujins are being pumped out over and over with little to no effort.
I wanna see how this shit ends cuz if she really cut that nigga head off it would be so funny. This is so clearly outta pocket
Can't wait to see compiled version.
This is so amazing and freaking hot!

Meh. The only good story from this "anthology" was the mother/daughter one, and It Just lasted only two chapters and felt very rushed, such a real shame since that concept was far more interesting than "generic wife gets blackmailed and gangbanged by generic tanned dudes" and "ninja becoming a sexslave" with another gangbang, how original.
He clearly didn't planned a whole series and It shows since the husband revenge chapter from the first story was and afterthought (acccording to the author Twitter).  Really waste of talent, since the previous story from this author where very good (Natsu Jirou)
Honestly mc should have kill them all. But this is just pure garbage....
NOW this is garbage! The MC couldn't stand this bullshit any more and escaped, and now this pregnant bitch is going to chase and kill him, WTF!
